manual_tests.instructions: These tests require physical device execution

tests.name: app_launch_time
tests.instructions: Force close app, start timer, tap icon, stop when interactive

tests.name: time_to_first_token
tests.instructions: Send chat message, time until first AI token appears

tests.name: context_assembly_time
tests.instructions: Pull to refresh dashboard, time until all cards populated

tests.name: memory_usage_baseline
tests.instructions: Use app for 10 minutes, check for crashes and performance

tests.name: battery_impact_test
tests.instructions: Use app actively for 30 mins, check battery usage
